{{book | title=J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1995 | image = J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1995.jpg | illustrator=[[John Howe]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] | date=[[11 July]] [[1994]] | format=Wire-bound calendar with mailer | pages=14 | isbn=0-261-10308-3 | precededby=UK: [[J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994]]
US: [[The 1994 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] | followedby=[[J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1996]] }} The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1995''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[11 July]] [[1994]]. It features art by [[John Howe]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''. ==Illustrations== * Cover - "[[:File:John Howe - Gandalf Approaches the Guarded City.jpg|Gandalf Comes to the Guarded City]]" * January - "[[:File:John Howe - Smaug.jpg|Smaug]]" * February - "[[:File:John Howe - Morgoth's Force before Gondolin.jpg|The Battle for Gondolin]]" * March - "[[:File:John Howe - Gandalf Approaches the Guarded City.jpg|Gandalf Comes to the Guarded City]]" * April - "[[:File:John Howe - Gandalf Returns to Hobbiton.jpg|Gandalf Comes to Hobbiton]]" * May - "[[:File:John Howe - The White Tower of Elwing.jpg|The White Tower of Elwing]]" * June - "[[:File:John Howe - The Door of Night.jpg|The Door of Night]]" * July - "[[:File:John Howe - The Watchful Peace.jpg|Minas Tirith]]" * August - "[[:File:John Howe - The Fall of Gondolin.jpg|The Fall of Gondolin]]" * September - "[[:File:John Howe - Ulmo, Lord of the Waters.jpg|Ulmo, The Lord of Waters]]" * October - "[[:File:John Howe - The Killing of the Trees.jpg|Melkor and UngoliantÃ« before the Two Trees]]" * November - "[[:File:John Howe - Fingolfin's Challenge.jpg|Fingolfin's Challenge to Morgoth]]" * December - "[[:File:John Howe - The Siege of Angband.jpg|The Siege of Angband]]" ==Variants== File:J.R.R.
